# Mapping



How to run
----------
The dataset is organized in the following way::
::

        ├── data
        │   ├── test
        │           ├── images
        │           └── masks

        │   └── train_val
        │           ├── images
        │           └── masks
        ├── predictions
        ├── history
        │ ......................

Dataset 

### Run each Model:
        Run: 
        1. python train.sh
        2. python plotting.sh  (need path roots)
